With ğ…ğ¨ğ§ğ­ğ¢ğŸğ², you can easily customize the text of your posts on Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter (other platforms coming soon!). Fontify lets you choose from a variety of fonts to make your posts stand out. Whether you want to express your mood, personality or creativity, Fontify has the perfect font for you. Just choose a font, select the text to update and click on the Fontify icon. Fontify will apply the selected style to your text. You can also preview and change the style before publishing. Fontify is simple, fun and free.
